who we are?

GIW Consulting is a Professional Management and Consulting company formed in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and has been in the business since 2006. It has a Professional Management Consulting license from the Dubai Economic Department and the companyâ€™s senior management has over 50 years of business management experience globally.

GIW Consulting with offices at the prestigious Dubai World Trade Centre. Supported by banking experts and strategic business partners in cross jurisdictional locations.

Our Expertise

company formation and corporate secretarial services

Our company offers full spectrum of company formation services in incorporating companies in over 7 countries.

  • Freezone and Mainland establishment
  • Company formation
  • Company secretarial and corporate administration
  • Corporate governance
  • Liquidation support

Regulatory and compliance services

Our team of professionals keep abreast of the laws and regulations to guarantee continuing legal compliance in each jurisdiction. We ensure that the legal entities maintain a proper framework of governance extending all the way to meeting uniquely specified administrative needs of the most active business enterprises.

  • Statutory reporting
  • Year-round regulatory compliance
  • Compliance support
  • Substance reviews

Management consultancy

Drawing on decades of experience and a wide-range source of knowledge base, we provide our clients on the type and jurisdiction that best suits their business after comprehensively considering the business profile, logistics, facilities, financial, tax and suitability factors that drives their business.

We also introduce, coordinate and engage in contract negotiations and preparation of due diligence requirements.

  • Market research and Feasibility analysis
  • Jurisdiction Advisory
  • Deal Advisory Services
  • Client and Profit growth strategy
  • Business introductions
